home.title: Take control of your privacy
home.description: Define your Subject Data Preferences for the contact management system without the need to create an account. Set your data handling preferences to control how your information is processed.

preferences.title: Subject Data Preferences
preferences.description: Declare how you want your personal information to be handled when stored in the contact management system with a one-time passcode.

access.title: Subject Data Access
access.description: See how your data is used in the contact management system and how other users are using it. Make informed decisions about your privacy and data usage.

login.title: Sign in with email or phone
login.description: Enter your email address or phone number to receive a one-time passcode. No account creation required.
login.mockModeDescription: This code is displayed because MOCK_SMS or MOCK_EMAIL is enabled.
login.disclaimer: Do not enter your real information

preferences.title: Your Preferences
preferences.description: Control how your personal information is handled in the contact management system. Select which contact fields you want to keep private and prevent from being synced.
preferences.explanation: When someone creates a contact card with your information, the following fields will not be included if you've marked them as private:

birthday.label: Birthday
birthday.description: Date of birth and age information

preferences.statusUnsaved: You have unsaved changes. Save them to apply to the contact provider.
preferences.statusSynced: Your privacy preferences are synchronized with the contact provider.
preferences.loadErrorDescription: Unable to load your current privacy settings. Please refresh the page.
preferences.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and refresh the page.
preferences.saveSuccessDescription: Your privacy settings have been synchronized with the contact provider.
preferences.saveErrorDescription: Please try again. If the problem persists, contact support.
preferences.saveNetworkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.

access.title: Data about you
access.description: See how your personal information is used in the contact provider system and how other users are storing your data. This transparency helps you make informed decisions about your Subject Data Preferences.
access.providerDescription: Synchronize with the contact provider to refresh the data shown on this page and ensure you see the most current information about how your data is being used.

errors.notFoundMessage: The requested page could not be found.
